lo+percentage*range;}function normalize(value,lo,hi){return(value-lo)/(hi-lo);}function deg2rad(deg){return Math.PI*deg/180.0;}function erf(x){var sign=x>=0?1:-1;x=Math.abs(x);var a1=0.254829592;var
